hello!

Treawna here, an artist, graphic designer, photographer, musician & nutritionist based in Ottawa, Canada. I specialize in obsessing over the fine details while calmly translating information into pleasing visual experiences!

want to talk about it?

I would love to hear about what you're working on! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have a design or photo project in mind.
